metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：水文气象观测网数据集（巴吉滩戈壁站自动气象站-2014）
metadata.description:
The data set contains the observation data of meteorological elements from the Bajitan Gobi Desert Station, which is located along the middle reaches of the Heihe Hydro-meteorological Observation Network, and the data set covers data from January 1, 2014 to December 31, 2014. The station is located in Bajitan, West Zhangye City, Gansu Province, the underlying surface is Gobi. The latitude and longitude of the observation point is 100.3042E, 38.9150N, and the altitude is 1562m. The air temperature and relative humidity sensors are erected 5 and 10 meters above the ground, facing North; the barometer is installed 2 meters above the ground; tipping bucket rain gauge is installed 10 meters above the ground; the wind speed sensors are set 5 and 10 meters above the ground, facing North; the four-component radiometer is installed 6 meters above the ground, facing South; two infrared thermometers are installed 6 meters above the ground, facing South, and the probe orientation is vertical downward; the soil temperature probes are buried respectively at 0cm on the ground surface, 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm and 100cm under the ground, they are located 2 meters from the meteorological tower in the North. The soil moisture sensors are buried 2cm, 4cm, 10cm, 20cm, 40cm, 60cm and 100cm under the ground, 2 meters from the meteorological tower in the South; the soil heat flow boards (3 pieces) are buried 6cm under the ground. 
Observed items include: air temperature and humidity (Ta_5m、RH_5m、Ta_10m、RH_10m) (unit: Celsius, percentage), pressure(Press) (unit:hectopascal), precipitation (Rain) (unit: mm), wind speed (WS_5m、WS_10m) (unit: meter / sec), wind direction (WD_10m) (unit: degree), four-component radiation (DR, UR, DLR_Cor, ULR_Cor, Rn) (unit: watt / square meter), surface radiation temperature (IRT_1, IRT_2) (unit: Celsius) , soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, Gs_3) (unit: watt / square meter), soil moisture (Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_100cm) (unit: volumetric water content, percentage), soil temperature (Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_100cm) (unit : Celsius).
Processing and quality control of observation data: (1) Ensure 144 data per day (every 10 minutes), if there is missing data, it is marked as -6999. Due to sensor problem, Ms_40cm data between January 1 and March 2 had a large fluctuation, it can only be used as reference. (2) Eliminate moments with duplicate records; (3) Remove data that is significantly beyond physical meaning or beyond the measuring range of the instrument; (4) Data marked by red is debatable; (5) The formats of the date and time are uniform, and the date and time are in the same column. For example, the time is: 2014-6-10 10:30; (6) The naming rule is: AWS + site name.
For hydro-meteorological network or site information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018). For observation data processing, please refer to Liu et al. (2011).
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2014年1月1日至2014年12月31日黑河水文气象观测网中游巴吉滩戈壁站气象要素观测数据，站点位于甘肃省张掖市城西巴吉滩，下垫面是戈壁。观测点的经纬度是100.3042E, 38.9150N，海拔1562m。空气温度、相对湿度传感器架设在5m、10m处，朝向正北；气压计安装在2m处；翻斗式雨量计安装在10m处；风速传感器架设在5m、10m，风向传感器架设在10m，朝向正北；四分量辐射仪安装在6m处，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装在6m处，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm和100cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤水分传感器分别埋设在地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、60cm和100cm处，在距离气象塔2m的正南方；土壤热流板（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处。
观测项目有：空气温湿度（Ta_5m、RH_5m、Ta_10m、RH_10m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、风速（WS_5m、WS_10m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_10m）(单位：度)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_60cm、Ms_100cm）(单位：体积含水量，百分比)和土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_60cm、Ts_100cm）（单位：摄氏度）。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；40cm土壤水分在1.1-3.2之间由于传感器的问题，波动相对较大，可作为参考；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2014-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称。
水文气象网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al.(2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Therefore, one-source models explicitly cannot estimate the surface evapotranspiration accurately because the effect of.

Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.
research objective: In this letter, the ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures were used to estimate E, T, and ET, which were better validated with observed ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes, and the ET measurements using an eddy covariance (EC) system.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.
challenges: However, the current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions. Moreover, E and T are difficult to measure on the ground.

Errors in the derived component temperature were primarily caused by image classification errors; these classification errors varied with vegetation abundance. The higher uncertainty of H estimation is not only caused by the uncertainty of the TSEB model but also due to the increased uncertainty of the EC system, which is 18% when the mean H is small in the irrigated farmland. Due to image pixel classification errors, soil pixels were counted as vegetation pixels, which produced an overestimation of the canopy temperature under the developing vegetation abundance. Alternatively, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance could have produced the uncertainties in the estimated temperatures. In addition, the estimated uncertainty of the incoming short- and long-wave radiation transmittances through the canopy may be another source of Rn estimation errors.
methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. Data of day of year (DOY) 170, 173, 176, 192, 195, 231, 252, and 256 were used to determine ET and the ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) to ET during the Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces, which was part of the Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER-MUSOEXE).
findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散发（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散发估算模型将土壤-植被组件合并为一个单一源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散发，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“冠层上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况。水蒸气和热量在冠层内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过冠层顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型较为复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测，这些参数和观测无法从操作性卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改善了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射仪视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量值来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已被广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了与使用波恩比-能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果相比的总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层）。

在强烈对流的灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，尤其是在能量平衡闭合不完整的情况下，EC通量测量的H和LE与可用能量Rn−G0之间的关系更为复杂。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。本文显示，与观测到的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在过高估计的现象。这往往对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，该区域的强对流环境也是另一个因素。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层成分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，得到了E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观察比率。
这封信的目的是利用高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，通过一系列TSEB模型来估计蒸散发（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发总量（ET），并随后结合稳定氧和氢同位素技术以及涡动相关（EC）测量，更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误引起的；这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还由于EC系统的不确定性，当灌溉农田的平均H较小时，这种不确定性为18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被计算为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度被高估。另一方面，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括离地5米处的气温、风速和湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及使用10 Hz采样频率的EC系统在离地4.5米处测量的湍流通量。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天的07:00至19:00之间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的感热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）计算得出。土壤和冠层的组件温度是通过热像仪获取的图像计算得出的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮温。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区是一个人工绿洲，覆盖着玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）以及蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）相对于蒸散发的比率，这些研究是在多尺度蒸散发观测实验中进行的，属于黑河水联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强烈的对流条件下，TSEB模型仍能可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，与EC系统的测量值相比，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组件温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度，E和T可以通过TSEB模型准确地从ET中分离出来。

background: Upscaling of eco-hydrological processes on a heterogeneous surface is a grand challenge. Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations. HiWATER is an experiment designed to address this challenge through instrumentation on hierarchically nested scales to obtain multiscale and multidisciplinary data.
challenges: Progress in this field is hindered by the poor availability of multiscale observations.
methods: Several intensive observation periods (IOPs) and continuous hydrometeorological observations were carried out during HiWATER. Only data collected during the IOP in 2012 are presented in this paper. Instruments for the oasis-desert system were arranged in hierarchically nested scales to capture multi-scale eco-hydrological processes. We established a sparse network to investigate the oasis-desert interaction. One superstation was constructed within the oasis, and four EC towers and four two-layer automatic meteorological stations (AMSs) were installed in different landscapes surrounding the oasis, including sandy desert, desert pavement, desert steppe, and wetland. Intensive observations were implemented at the irrigation district scale. A total of 12 airborne remote sensing missions were conducted to cover the FEA using LiDAR, an imaging spectrometer, a multi-angle thermal imager, and an L-band microwave radiometer.
dataset: We introduce a multiscale dataset obtained from Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) in an oasis-desert area in 2012. The HiWATER observation system consists of a flux observation matrix of eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations; an eco-hydrological sensor network of soil moisture and leaf area index; hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometer, multi-angle thermal imager, and L-band microwave radiometer; and synchronical ground measurements of vegetation dynamics and photosynthesis processes. All observational data were carefully quality controlled throughout sensor calibration, data collection, data processing, and datasets generation. The data are freely available at figshare and the Cold and Arid Regions Science Data Centre.
backgroundCn: 生态水文过程在异质表面上的放大是一个重大挑战。该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的制约。HiWATER实验旨在通过在分层嵌套尺度上进行仪器布置，以获取多尺度和多学科的数据，从而应对这一挑战。
challengesCn: 该领域的进展受到多尺度观测稀缺的阻碍。
methodsCn: 在HiWATER期间进行了几次强烈观测期（IOPs）和连续的水文气象观测。本文仅展示了2012年IOP期间收集的数据。为了捕捉多尺度生态水文过程，绿洲-沙漠系统的仪器按照层级嵌套的尺度进行布置。我们建立了一个稀疏网络，以研究绿洲-沙漠的相互作用。在绿洲内建造了一个超级站，并在绿洲周围不同的景观中安装了四个涡度（EC）塔和四个两层自动气象站（AMS），这些景观包括沙质沙漠、沙漠铺装、沙漠草原和湿地。在灌溉区尺度上实施了强烈观测。共进行了12次空中遥感任务，使用了激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计覆盖FEA。
datasetCn: 我们介绍了一个多尺度数据集，该数据集来自2012年在绿洲-沙漠地区进行的黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）。HiWATER观测系统由涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站组成的通量观测矩阵；土壤湿度和叶面积指数的生态水文传感器网络；使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率航空遥感；以及同步的植被动态和光合作用过程的地面测量。所有观测数据在传感器校准、数据收集、数据处理和数据集生成过程中都经过了严格的质量控制。这些数据可在figshare和寒区与干旱区科学数据中心免费获取。

background: Sensible heat flux (H) is a significant component of land surface water and energy balance determinations. There are several methods for measuring surface water and heat fluxes, such as eddy covariance (EC) and Bowen ratio systems. For large-scale H, remote sensing (RS)-based observations are useful. RS instruments themselves cannot directly measure H. Therefore, methods for validating RS inversion products are critical for using such products. Since the 1990s, large aperture scintillometer (LAS) has been widely applied to measure sensible heat flux around the world, and it has also been used to validate RS estimations owing to the large scale of its measurements.
research objective: In this study, a weighted area-to-area regression kriging (WATA RK) model is proposed to convert EC-scale H to LAS-scale H. It involves path-weighting functions of EC and LAS source areas in both regression and area kriging stages.
challenges: However, methods of converting one H scale to another to validate RS products are still open for question. The method does not consider the path-weighting function in the EC- to LAS-scale kriging with the regression residue, which inevitably brought about a bias estimation.
methods: In the kernel area, 18 EC system sets were installed for the experiment, 17 of which were used in this study. Observations and footprints of the 17 EC and four LAS groups between 12:00 and 12:30 BST (Beijing Standard Time) were averaged to obtain a mean value when the atmosphere stability was under unstable conditions with high turbulent fluxes. By considering the wind direction, the wind speeds were decomposed into north and east components (WS), and then weighted averages were calculated with the corresponding EC and LAS footprint weights. After abstracting FVC, NDVI, LST, and WS with the footprint models, nine regression models were built for each of the periods based on the proposed multiple linear regression model. The four independent variables were also abstracted for the four LAS footprints. The residual part of LAS H is then estimated from the 17 EC H residuals by the above WATA kriging model.
dataset: Four groups of LAS (two sets in each group) were installed in 3 × 3 and 2 × 1 MODIS pixels. In the kernel area, 18 EC system sets were installed for the experiment, 17 of which were used in this study. There are also 17 automatic weather station sets (including a super-station) installed in the field. Nine observations (06/15, 06/24, 07/10, 08/02, 08/11, 08/18, 08/27, 09/03, and 09/12) made between June and September 2012 were selected for this study. Synchronous ASTER RS products at 12:15 BST were downloaded from the US—National Aeronautics and Space Administration and processed according to Zhou et al. [26] and Bastiaanssen et al. [27], including the Land Surface Temperature (LST) [26], Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI), and Fractional Vegetation Cover (FVC) [27].
findings: Results show that WATA RK outperforms traditional methods in most cases, improving estimation accuracy. The method is considered to provide an efficient validation of RS H flux products.
backgroundCn: 显热通量（H）是陆地表面水分和能量平衡确定的重要组成部分。测量表面水分和热通量的方法有多种，例如涡度协方差（EC）和波文比系统。对于大规模的H，基于遥感（RS）的观测非常有用。遥感仪器本身无法直接测量H。因此，验证遥感反演产品的方法对于使用这些产品至关重要。自1990年代以来，大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）已被广泛应用于全球范围内测量显热通量，并且由于其测量的广泛性，也被用于验证遥感估算。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，提出了一种加权区域到区域回归克里金（WATA RK）模型，用于将EC尺度的H转换为LAS尺度的H。该模型在回归和区域克里金阶段涉及EC和LAS源区域的路径加权函数。
challengesCn: 然而，将一种H尺度转换为另一种H尺度以验证RS产品的方法仍然存在疑问。该方法没有考虑在EC到LAS尺度克里金法中回归残差的路径加权函数，这不可避免地导致了偏差估计。
methodsCn: 在核区，安装了18个EC系统集用于实验，其中17个在本研究中被使用。对17个EC和四个LAS组在北京时间12:00至12:30之间的观测和足迹进行了平均，以获得在不稳定条件下具有高湍流通量的平均值。考虑到风向，风速被分解为北向和东向分量（WS），然后根据相应的EC和LAS足迹权重计算加权平均值。在通过足迹模型提取FVC、NDVI、LST和WS后，基于所提出的多元线性回归模型为每个时期建立了九个回归模型。四个独立变量也为四个LAS足迹提取。然后通过上述WATA克里金模型从17个EC H残差中估计LAS H的残余部分。
datasetCn: 在3 × 3和2 × 1的MODIS像素中安装了四组LAS（每组两个套件）。在核心区域，安装了18个EC系统套件用于实验，其中17个在本研究中使用。现场还安装了17个自动气象站套件（包括一个超级气象站）。在2012年6月至9月之间选择了9次观测（06/15、06/24、07/10、08/02、08/11、08/18、08/27、09/03和09/12）用于本研究。同步的ASTER遥感产品在BST时间12:15下载自美国国家航空航天局，并根据Zhou等人[26]和Bastiaanssen等人[27]的研究进行处理，包括地表温度（LST）[26]、归一化差异植被指数（NDVI）和植被覆盖度（FVC）[27]。
findingsCn: 结果显示，WATA RK在大多数情况下优于传统方法，提高了估计准确性。该方法被认为为RS H通量产品提供了有效的验证。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区大约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区被先前的研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，以及风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测，同时也记录了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，其中包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are the key components of a hydrometeorological observation network in arid regions?
Definition.QuestionCn: 干旱地区水文气象观测网络的关键组成部分有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: A hydrometeorological observation network in arid regions typically includes automatic meteorological stations measuring air temperature, wind speed, humidity, radiation, and turbulent fluxes. It may also include soil moisture sensors, soil heat flux plates, eddy covariance systems, large aperture scintillometers, and various remote sensing instruments like LiDAR and thermal imagers.
Definition.AnswerCn: 干旱地区的水文气象观测网络通常包括自动气象站，测量空气温度、风速、湿度、辐射和湍流通量。它还可能包括土壤湿度传感器、土壤热通量板、涡度协方差系统、大孔径闪烁仪以及各种遥感仪器，如激光雷达和热成像仪。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with measuring evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在异质景观中测量蒸散发面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges associated with measuring evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes include accurately estimating surface fluxes due to the mixture of soil and vegetation, managing the complexity of model parameters, handling uncertainties in surface-air temperature differences, and accounting for the effects of strong advective environments.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在异质景观中测量蒸散发所面临的挑战包括由于土壤和植被的混合而准确估计表面通量、管理模型参数的复杂性、处理表面与空气温度差异的不确定性，以及考虑强对流环境的影响。

Comparison.AnswerEn: The AWS-based method provides continuous hydrometeorological data with a high temporal resolution of every 10 minutes at specific locations, whereas the HiWATER experiment covers multiple scales including regional observations with airborne remote sensing and a network of flux towers, offering a broader spatial scale.

Interpretation.AnswerEn: Multi-scale data acquisition, involving various instruments such as eddy covariance towers, automatic meteorological stations, and remote sensing devices, enables comprehensive observation of eco-hydrological processes across different scales. This approach facilitates a detailed interpretation of oasis-desert interactions, providing insights into the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange dynamics critical for maintaining ecological stability and supporting sustainable development.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多尺度数据采集，涉及涡度协方差塔、自动气象站和遥感设备等多种仪器，使得能够全面观察不同尺度的生态水文过程。这种方法有助于对绿洲-沙漠相互作用进行详细解读，提供关于能量、水汽和碳交换动态的见解，这对于维持生态稳定和支持可持续发展至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately measuring evapotranspiration in heterogeneous landscapes using remote sensing methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在异质景观中，使用遥感方法准确测量蒸散发面临的挑战的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in accurately measuring evapotranspiration (ET) in heterogeneous landscapes using remote sensing methods stem from factors such as the complexity of the two-source energy balance models, errors in the derived component temperatures due to image classification errors, and uncertainties in measuring soil and canopy component temperatures. Additionally, the strong advective environments and incomplete energy balance closure with respect to available energy can further complicate accurate ET measurement.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在异质景观中准确测量蒸散发（ET）的挑战源于多个因素，例如双源能量平衡模型的复杂性、由于图像分类错误导致的衍生组分温度误差，以及土壤和冠层组分温度测量的不确定性。此外，强烈的平流环境和可用能量的能量平衡闭合不完全也进一步 complicate 了准确的 ET 测量。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why are multiscale observations crucial for understanding eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么多尺度观测对于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中的生态水文过程至关重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Multiscale observations are crucial for understanding eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems because these systems are characterized by their complexity and heterogeneity. The poor availability of multiscale data has historically hindered progress in this field. By capturing data at multiple scales, researchers can better understand interactions within the oasis-desert ecosystem and address the challenges of scaling up observations to larger areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测对于理解绿洲-沙漠系统中的生态水文过程至关重要，因为这些系统的复杂性和异质性使其具有独特的特征。历史上，多尺度数据的稀缺性一直阻碍着该领域的发展。通过在多个尺度上捕获数据，研究人员可以更好地理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统内的相互作用，并应对将观测结果扩展到更大区域的挑战。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes difficulties in validating remote sensing products for sensible heat flux measurement?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致验证遥感产品在显热通量测量方面困难的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Difficulties in validating remote sensing products for sensible heat flux measurement are caused by the challenges in converting the scale of measurements from eddy covariance (EC) systems to large aperture scintillometers (LAS). Traditional methods do not account for path-weighting functions in the kriging process, leading to biases. Moreover, the inherent difference in the scale of measurements between ground-based EC systems and remote sensing observations adds to the complexity and potential for errors.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 验证遥感产品以测量显热通量的困难，源于将涡动协方差（EC）系统的测量尺度转换为大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）时所面临的挑战。传统方法未能在克里金过程（kriging）中考虑路径加权函数，导致偏差。此外，地面EC系统与遥感观测之间测量尺度的固有差异增加了复杂性和潜在错误的可能性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the consequences of applying a weighted area-to-area regression kriging model to convert EC-scale data to LAS-scale data for validating remote sensing products?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将加权区域到区域回归克里金模型应用于将EC尺度数据转换为LAS尺度数据以验证遥感产品可能会产生什么后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Applying a weighted area-to-area regression kriging model to convert EC-scale data to LAS-scale data can improve the accuracy of validation for remote sensing products. This method accounts for spatial variability and path-weighting functions, which can lead to more reliable validation of sensible heat flux estimates and enhance the utility of remote sensing data in large-scale environmental monitoring.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 应用加权区域到区域回归克里金模型将电导率尺度数据转换为激光扫描尺度数据，可以提高遥感产品验证的准确性。这种方法考虑了空间变异性和路径加权函数，从而可以更可靠地验证显热通量估计，并增强遥感数据在大规模环境监测中的实用性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of employing a multiscale observation system to capture eco-hydrological processes in oasis-desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 采用多尺度观测系统捕捉绿洲-沙漠系统中的生态水文过程的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goals of employing a multiscale observation system are to address the challenge of upscaling eco-hydrological processes on heterogenous surfaces by capturing data at hierarchically nested scales. This approach aims to provide a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas to support ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 采用多尺度观测系统的目标是通过在层次嵌套的尺度上捕获数据，解决在异质表面上进行生态水文过程上升尺度的挑战。该方法旨在定量理解绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水蒸气和碳交换，以支持生态稳定性和社会经济发展。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of developing a model to convert eddy covariance-scale sensible heat flux to large aperture scintillometer-scale measurements?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一个模型将涡度协方差尺度的显热通量转换为大孔径闪烁仪尺度的测量值的目的是为了什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The purpose of developing such a model is to improve the validation of remote sensing products by accurately converting smaller scale measurements to larger scale measurements. This conversion helps in reducing bias and increasing the estimation accuracy of sensible heat flux, which is a significant component of land surface water and energy balance determinations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 开发这种模型的目的是通过准确地将小尺度测量转换为大尺度测量，从而改善遥感产品的验证。这种转换有助于减少偏差，提高显热通量的估计准确性，而显热通量是陆地表面水分和能量平衡确定中的一个重要组成部分。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed in converting eddy covariance-scale sensible heat flux (H) to large aperture scintillometer-scale H for remote sensing validation?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 将涡动协方差尺度的显热通量（H）转换为大孔径闪烁仪尺度的H以进行遥感验证时，采用了哪些方法论？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The weighted area-to-area regression kriging (WATA RK) model is proposed to convert EC-scale H to LAS-scale H. This model involves path-weighting functions of EC and LAS source areas in both regression and area kriging stages. Observations and footprints of EC and LAS systems are averaged to obtain mean values under unstable atmospheric conditions with high turbulent fluxes. The method involves multiple linear regression models with variables abstracted for LAS footprints and estimates the LAS H residual from EC H residuals using the WATA RK model.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 提出了加权面积到面积回归克里金（WATA RK）模型，以将EC尺度的H转换为LAS尺度的H。该模型在回归和区域克里金阶段涉及EC和LAS源区域的路径加权函数。在不稳定大气条件下，具有高湍流通量的情况下，EC和LAS系统的观测值和足迹被平均，以获得均值。该方法涉及多个线性回归模型，变量抽象自LAS足迹，并使用WATA RK模型根据EC H残差估计LAS H残差。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the technological advancements that have enabled the integration of multiscale and multidisciplinary data collection in eco-hydrological studies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使生态水文研究中多尺度和多学科数据收集的整合成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Technological advancements such as the use of hierarchically nested scales of instrumentation, including flux observation matrices, eco-hydrological sensor networks, and hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing using LiDAR, imaging spectrometers, multi-angle thermal imagers, and L-band microwave radiometers have enabled the integration of multiscale and multidisciplinary data collection in eco-hydrological studies.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 技术进步，例如使用分层嵌套的仪器量测尺度，包括通量观测矩阵、生态水文传感器网络，以及使用激光雷达、成像光谱仪、多角度热成像仪和L波段微波辐射计的超高分辨率空中遥感，已经使生态水文研究中的多尺度和多学科数据收集得以整合。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do path-weighting functions contribute to the conversion of eddy covariance data to large aperture scintillometer scale data?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 路径加权函数如何有助于将涡度协方差数据转换为大孔径闪烁仪尺度数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Path-weighting functions contribute to the conversion by accounting for the source area differences between eddy covariance (EC) and large aperture scintillometer (LAS) data. This involves using the functions in both regression and area kriging stages, which helps to improve the estimation accuracy of scaling EC-scale sensible heat fluxes to LAS-scale.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 路径加权函数通过考虑涡度协方差（EC）和大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）数据之间的源区差异，促进了转换。这涉及在回归和区域克里金阶段使用这些函数，从而有助于提高将EC尺度的显热通量估算到LAS尺度的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways does the use of thermal infrared cameras improve the accuracy of energy balance models in heterogeneous landscapes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 热红外相机的使用如何提高异质景观中能量平衡模型的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Thermal infrared cameras improve the accuracy by providing high-resolution measurements of soil and canopy component temperatures, which are crucial for estimating evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration. These measurements help refine energy balance models by providing better validation of component temperatures against observed ratios and enabling accurate separation of latent heat fluxes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 热红外相机通过提供土壤和冠层组分温度的高分辨率测量，提高了准确性，这对于估算蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散非常重要。这些测量有助于通过提供更好的组分温度与观测比率的验证，来优化能量平衡模型，并实现潜热通量的准确分离。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of multiscale observations in heterogeneous land surfaces?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在异质性陆地表面上确保多尺度观测的准确性和可靠性可能会面临挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in ensuring accuracy and reliability of multiscale observations include the poor availability of multiscale observations and the complex instrumentation required at hierarchically nested scales to capture eco-hydrological processes. These challenges are addressed by using a combination of ground-based measurements and remote sensing technologies, as seen in the HiWATER experiment.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 确保多尺度观测的准确性和可靠性面临的挑战包括多尺度观测的可用性差以及在分层嵌套尺度上捕捉生态水文过程所需的复杂仪器。这些挑战通过结合地面测量和遥感技术来解决，正如在HiWATER实验中所见。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected difficulties in validating remote sensing products for sensible heat flux measurements, and how might these be addressed?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 验证遥感产品在显热通量测量中的预期困难是什么，以及如何解决这些问题？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The expected difficulties in validating remote sensing products for sensible heat flux include the inability of remote sensing instruments to directly measure heat fluxes and the challenge of converting flux measurements from small to large scales. These issues are often addressed by implementing methods like weighted area-to-area regression kriging (WATA RK) and using multiple linear regression models based on footprint models.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 验证遥感产品在显热通量方面的预期困难包括遥感仪器无法直接测量热通量，以及将小尺度的通量测量转换为大尺度的挑战。这些问题通常通过实施加权区域到区域回归克里金（WATA RK）方法和基于足迹模型的多元线性回归模型来解决。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might it be critical to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems for sustainable development, and what data collection strategies could support this goal?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡对于可持续发展可能至关重要，哪些数据收集策略可以支持这一目标？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Maintaining a balance between oasis and desert systems is critical for ecological stability and socioeconomic development in arid regions. This requires understanding the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in these ecosystems. Long-term observational datasets, including turbulent flux data, hydrometeorological data, and vegetation and soil parameters, are crucial to support these goals and are collected using a combination of automatic weather stations, eddy covariance systems, and scintillometers.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对生态稳定和社会经济发展至关重要。这需要理解这些生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换。长期观测数据集，包括湍流通量数据、水文气象数据以及植被和土壤参数，对于支持这些目标至关重要，这些数据是通过自动气象站、涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪的组合收集的。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effectively do you think the integration of ground-based measurements and remote sensing can address the challenges of data scarcity in heterogeneous landscapes?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您认为地面测量与遥感的整合能多有效地解决异质景观中数据稀缺的挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The integration of ground-based measurements and remote sensing is promising for addressing data scarcity in heterogeneous landscapes. It combines the detail and accuracy of ground-based observations with the extensive coverage of remote sensing. The use of techniques like the TSEB model, which leverages both types of data, suggests improved accuracy in measuring evapotranspiration and energy fluxes. However, challenges remain, such as the need for accurate temperature measurements and the validation of remote sensing products.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 地面测量与遥感的结合在异质景观中解决数据稀缺问题方面前景广阔。它将地面观测的细节和准确性与遥感的广泛覆盖相结合。使用像TSEB模型这样的技术，利用这两种数据，表明在测量蒸散发和能量通量方面的准确性得到了改善。然而，仍然存在一些挑战，例如对温度测量的准确性要求以及对遥感产品的验证。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your assessment of the reliability of datasets obtained from multi-scale observation systems in capturing oasis-desert interactions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您如何评估从多尺度观测系统获得的数据集在捕捉绿洲-沙漠相互作用方面的可靠性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Datasets from multi-scale observation systems are quite reliable for capturing oasis-desert interactions, especially when they incorporate diverse data sources like eddy covariance towers, automatic meteorological stations, and remote sensing. These systems provide a comprehensive view of the eco-hydrological processes. However, the reliability can be affected by factors such as sensor calibration, data processing, and quality control challenges.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多尺度观测系统的数据集在捕捉绿洲-沙漠相互作用方面相当可靠，特别是当它们结合了诸如涡度协方差塔、自动气象站和遥感等多种数据源时。这些系统提供了生态水文过程的全面视角。然而，可靠性可能会受到传感器校准、数据处理和质量控制挑战等因素的影响。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: Do you believe that the current methodologies for converting eddy covariance scale measurements to larger scales adequately support remote sensing validation?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 你认为目前将涡度协方差尺度测量转换为更大尺度的方法是否足够支持遥感验证？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Current methodologies, such as the weighted area-to-area regression kriging (WATA RK) model, show promise in converting eddy covariance scale measurements to larger scales for remote sensing validation. These methods improve estimation accuracy by considering path-weighting functions. However, there are still challenges in ensuring unbiased estimations, suggesting that further refinement and testing in different environmental conditions may be necessary to fully support remote sensing validation.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前的方法，如加权区域到区域回归克里金（WATA RK）模型，在将涡度协方差尺度的测量转换为更大尺度以进行遥感验证方面显示出良好的前景。这些方法通过考虑路径加权函数来提高估计的准确性。然而，在确保无偏估计方面仍然存在挑战，这表明在不同环境条件下进一步的改进和测试可能是必要的，以充分支持遥感验证。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection for hydrometeorological observations can be standardized across different oasis-desert ecosystems?
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何在不同的绿洲-沙漠生态系统中标准化水文气象观测的数据收集。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data collection for hydrometeorological observations in oasis-desert ecosystems involves using automatic weather stations and eddy covariance systems. These systems capture data such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature, air temperature, humidity gradients, wind speed, and air pressure in a standardized format over a set period. The observations are then subjected to quality control processes involving data calibration, collection, processing, and archiving, which ensure consistency across different environments.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，水文气象观测的数据收集涉及使用自动气象站和涡度协方差系统。这些系统以标准化格式在设定时间内捕获辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度、空气温度、湿度梯度、风速和气压等数据。随后，这些观测数据经过质量控制过程，包括数据校准、收集、处理和归档，以确保不同环境之间的一致性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about how datasets from remote sensing instruments can effectively validate surface water and heat flux measurements?
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定遥感仪器的数据集如何有效验证地表水和热通量测量。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Remote sensing instruments, while useful for large-scale observations, cannot directly measure variables such as sensible heat flux. Validation of these measurements typically involves methods like using large aperture scintillometers (LAS) to validate RS inversion products. A weighted area-to-area regression kriging (WATA RK) model is often used to convert data from smaller-scale eddy covariance (EC) measurements to larger LAS scales, ensuring more accurate validation of remote sensing data.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 遥感仪器虽然对大规模观测非常有用，但无法直接测量如显热通量等变量。这些测量的验证通常涉及使用大孔径闪烁仪（LAS）来验证遥感反演产品。加权区域到区域回归克里金（WATA RK）模型常用于将较小尺度的涡度协方差（EC）测量数据转换为较大的LAS尺度，从而确保对遥感数据的更准确验证。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify the challenges associated with converting small-scale hydrological data to larger scales for remote sensing validation, and suggest potential solutions to these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别将小规模水文数据转换为更大尺度以进行遥感验证所面临的挑战，并提出解决这些挑战的潜在方案。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges in converting small-scale hydrological data to larger scales for remote sensing validation include bias estimation due to the lack of path-weighting functions in the kriging process, leading to inaccuracies. To address these challenges, a weighted area-to-area regression kriging model can be used, which integrates path-weighting functions in both regression and area kriging stages. This approach helps in better alignment between different scales and improves estimation accuracy.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 将小规模水文数据转换为大规模以进行遥感验证的挑战包括由于克里金过程缺乏路径加权函数而导致的偏差估计，从而导致不准确。为了解决这些挑战，可以使用加权面积到面积的回归克里金模型，该模型在回归和面积克里金阶段都集成了路径加权函数。这种方法有助于不同尺度之间的更好对齐，并提高估计的准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential datasets or data collection approaches to improve understanding of eco-hydrological processes in oasis–desert ecosystems, emphasizing multiscale observations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探索潜在的数据集或数据收集方法，以提高对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中生态水文过程的理解，强调多尺度观测。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets to improve understanding of eco-hydrological processes in oasis–desert ecosystems include multiscale data obtained from the Heihe Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER) project. This includes a combination of flux observation matrices from eddy covariance towers, large aperture scintillometers, and automatic meteorological stations, as well as hyper-resolution airborne remote sensing data using LiDAR and imaging spectrometers. The datasets encompass energy, water vapor, carbon fluxes, and auxiliary hydrometeorological data. Multiscale observation periods, such as intensive observation periods and continuous data collection over several years, provide comprehensive insights into these systems.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集可以改善对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中生态水文过程的理解，包括从黑河流域联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER）项目获得的多尺度数据。这些数据包括来自涡度协方差塔、大孔径闪烁仪和自动气象站的通量观测矩阵，以及使用激光雷达和成像光谱仪的超高分辨率航空遥感数据。这些数据集涵盖了能量、水蒸气、碳通量和辅助气象水文数据。多尺度观测周期，如强化观测期和连续多年的数据收集，提供了对这些系统的全面洞察。
